title: Custom Landing Page Template
description: This is a fully customizable Landing Page template that showcases all raw component exports, supports complete custom configuration, perfect for developers with special needs for deep customization.

customization.title: Complete Customization
customization.description: All components support complete custom configuration, you can adjust any parameters according to project requirements.

rawExport.title: Raw Export
rawExport.description: Use raw component exports directly without any preset configuration

fullControl.title: Full Control
fullControl.description: Have complete control over every property of the component

flexibleCombination.title: Flexible Combination
flexibleCombination.description: Freely combine different components to create unique pages

developerFriendly.title: Developer Friendly
developerFriendly.description: Perfect for experienced developers for deep customization
